com.dhemery.network

Class CodecEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dhemery.network.CodecEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SerializingEndpoint

    public class CodecEndpoint
extends Object
implements SerializingEndpoint
    An endpoint that uses a Codec to serialize and deserialize objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodecEndpoint(Endpoint endpoint, Codec codec)
      Create an endpoint that uses the Codec to serialize and deserialize objects transmitted through another endpoint.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T get(String path, Class<T> responseType)
      Send an HTTP GET request to the given path and deserialize the response into an object.
      <T> T put(String path, Object body, Class<T> responseType)
      Serialize the given object, send it via HTTP PUT and deserialize the response into an object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CodecEndpoint

        public CodecEndpoint(Endpoint endpoint,
             Codec codec)
        Create an endpoint that uses the Codec to serialize and deserialize objects transmitted through another endpoint.
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint through which to send and receive messages
        codec - the codec with which to serialize and deserialize objects
